channel.title: CVE Feed for CImg -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CImg -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-1010174|2024-08-05T03:07:18.472Z -- cimg -- the%20cimg%20library
item.description: CImg The CImg Library v.2.3.3 and earlier is affected by: command injection. The impact is: RCE. The component is: load_network() function. The attack vector is: Loading an image from a user-controllable url can lead to command injection, because no string sanitization is done on the url. The fixed version is: v.2.3.4.
